name: @switchboard-xyz/switchboard-v2
author: mitch@switchboard.xyz
description: API wrapper for intergating with the Switchboardv2 program

scripts.build:protos: shx mkdir -p src/protos; pbjs -t static-module -o src/protos/index.js ../protos/*.proto && pbts -o src/protos/index.d.ts src/protos/index.js
scripts.build:cjs:protos: shx rm -rf lib/cjs/protos; shx mkdir -p lib/cjs/protos; pbjs -t static-module -o lib/cjs/protos/index.js ../protos/*.proto && pbts -o lib/cjs/protos/index.d.ts lib/cjs/protos/index.js
scripts.build:esm:protos: shx rm -rf lib/esm/protos; shx mkdir -p lib/esm/protos; pbjs -t static-module --es6 -w "es6" -o lib/esm/protos/index.js ../protos/*.proto && pbts -o lib/esm/protos/index.d.ts lib/esm/protos/index.js && shx --silent sed  -i 'protobufjs/minimal' 'protobufjs/minimal.js' lib/esm/protos/index.js && shx --silent sed -i 'import \* as' 'import' lib/esm/protos/index.js
scripts.build: yarn build:protos && yarn build:cjs && yarn build:esm
